Name: Mistweaver Drake
Story Background: Born from the mists that shroud the Dimir city, the Mistweaver Drakes are elusive creatures that glide through the air with uncanny agility, delivering messages and secrets with silent grace.
Ability: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant)
Appearance Description: The Mistweaver Drake is a sleek, serpent-like creature with opalescent scales that shimmer with an otherworldly glow. Its wings are translucent like mist, allowing it to blend seamlessly into the fog-covered landscape.
